title: Coronavirus outbreak | Uddhav Thackeray warns against spread of ‘communal virus’

content:
Maharashtra Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray on Saturday warned of strict action against persons spreading communally divisive messages on social media amidst rising cases of COVID-19.
Also read | Use more masks, India's top science advisory body recommends
